text: W. Steelman Mathis (December 1, 1898 – September 19, 1981) was an American politician who served in the New Jersey Senate from 1941 to 1942 and 1947 to 1966. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1981 deaths Category:New Jersey state senators Category:New Jersey Republicans Category:Majority Leaders of the New Jersey Senate Category:Presidents of the New Jersey Senate Category:People from Tuckerton, New Jersey
title: W. Steelman Mathis
